LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Skull_Shielding.label: interference shielding
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Skull_Shielding.description: By utilizing a material resistant to psychic effects, we can create a Faraday cage around the brain, allowing the host to withstand any psychic assault.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Skull_Plating.label: cranial plating
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Skull_Plating.description: By increasing the resilience of the skull, it becomes much more difficult to damage the brain.
